summary: Completed comprehensive testing of language switcher functionality for Live Sales Inventory landing page. All language switching features (EN, KZ, RU) are working correctly with proper translations, localStorage persistence, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Language switcher dropdown appears in navbar
Language switcher shows EN, KZ, RU options correctly
Switching to Russian (RU) translates all page content properly
Switching to Kazakh (KZ) translates all page content properly
Switching back to English (EN) shows English content correctly
Language preference is persisted in localStorage
Navigation menu items translate correctly across all languages
CTA buttons translate correctly in navbar and hero sections
All sections translate when language changes
Mobile responsive - language switcher visible and accessible on mobile
Translation fallback to English works correctly
